document_data.name: House of Al-Karim
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Al-Karim''' was a tribe of [[Zakharan (ethnicity)|Zakharans]] inhabiting the deserts near [[Hiyal]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|84|[[Alia al-Karim]]}}
document_data.Organization: The tribe was led by [[Aasim Karim]] in 1367 DR.
document_data.Base of Operations: The exact location of their camp in the wilds surrounding Hiyal was unknown.
document_data.History: According to the House of Al-Karim, a wealthy merchant from Hiyal named [[Farid]] attacked and killed a member of the tribe without provocation. As a result, the entire tribe was moved for vengeance against the merchant.
